overview: The story revolves around a couple named Anupriya and Abhishek. They are married and lead a good lifestyle, however, due to work pressure, Abhishek gets less time for Anupriya due to which she is always upset, as she hardly gets a chance to make love with him. It's her birthday today and today Abhishek is in an erotic mood and he buys her flowers, let's find out how the day turns out.
title: Mysterious Lust
